What do we need in this ?

core module:

  • define constants and data-structues
  • mostly configurations and filesystem handlers

data module:

  • data handling

    • pack into dataframe

    • sort files into:

      • train / validate / test?
      • category

    • munging and cleaning and merging

      • zappos 50 k
      • scraped data
        • goat
        • sns

model module:

  • pretrained architectures

    • mobilenet v2 (from torchvision)
    • resnet (xresnet, from fastai)

  • feature extractor

    • headless model with "Identity" output

  • wiget tools (possibly move to sub-module?)

    • following the fastai wiget model
    • make some classes
    • datacleaner GUI (WIP)

VAE module:

  • VAE datablocks
  • models
  • callbacks
  • learner hacks
  • TODO:
    • AE version
    • CVAE vs VAE

etc?

  • visualization
    • embeddings
      • umap (replace tsne)
    • images
